Planning your 2026 travels? Discover the top 10 trending travel destinations worldwide, from Madeira to Abu Dhabi, based on global traveller reviews and ratings.

Europe’s “Hawaii” has been crowned the world’s top trending destination for 2026. Discover why Madeira is winning travellers over with scenery, culture and calm.

Ties driven by migration of people from Persia seeking fame and fortune has had a consequential impact on our society. A look at three such figures follows

Kuwait launches a digital multiple-trip exit permit for expat workers, enabling smoother travel, fewer approvals, reduced paperwork, and faster online processing through Ashal and Sahel platforms.

Travel players want higher budget for overseas marketing, simplified tax collected at source rates and modernised training to boost skill for the tourism industry, which has the potential to be a big job spinner

Discover the top 25 culture destinations in the world for 2026, ranked. From UNESCO sites to living traditions, these cities define cultural travel.

Abu Dhabi crowned World’s Best Cruise Destination 2025. Explore dual ports, cultural attractions, pristine beaches, wildlife safaris, and top maritime experiences.

Bali has been named the world’s top travel destination for 2026. From romantic villas to volcano adventures, here’s why travellers can’t get enough.

Chasing snow in 2026? Discover 6 stunning Asian winter destinations, from Japan’s powdery ski slopes to China’s ice cities and Himalayan snow escapes.

Discover why Dublin, Ireland, has been crowned the world’s best solo travel destination for 2026. Explore walkable streets, rich culture, historic landmarks, and welcoming pubs perfect for independent travellers.

Planning a solo trip in 2026? From London and New York to Bali and Hanoi, discover the world’s 10 best destinations for solo travellers, ranked for safety, culture, food and unforgettable experiences.

Discover the most powerful passports in 2026 according to the Henley Passport Index. See which countries offer visa-free travel, India’s ranking, and top destinations for globetrotters.

Discover Dhanushkodi, India’s haunting ghost town at the end of India where the Bay of Bengal meets the Indian Ocean. Explore its tragic history, mythological roots, abandoned ruins, beaches, and travel tips.

Discover 9 luxury vacation spots loved by celebrities, from Lake Como to the French Alps. Explore exclusive destinations, private villas, and secluded resorts perfect for a star-style getaway.

Delhi airspace will remain closed from January 21 for Republic Day rehearsals, affecting over 600 flights. Here’s what travellers need to know about timings, delays, and travel advisories.

New Delhi is set to host the world’s largest museum by end-2026. Here’s all you need to know about the Yuge Yugeen Bharat National Museum, its scale, galleries, and what visitors can expect.

Planning your honeymoon in 2026? Tripadvisor reveals the world’s 10 best honeymoon destinations—from Bali and the Maldives to Positano and Napa Valley—based on real traveller reviews.

Short on time this Republic Day long weekend 2026? These destinations within six hours of Delhi, Mumbai and Bengaluru are perfect for a quick getaway without taking extra leave.

India ranks 80th in the Henley Passport Index 2026 with visa-free access to 55 countries. Singapore retains the top spot as the world’s most powerful passport. Here’s what it means for Indian travellers.

Discover the world’s 5 most connected cities in 2026. From Kuala Lumpur to Doha, find out where travelers can enjoy lightning-fast internet, affordable mobile data, and seamless Wi-Fi connectivity.

Discover the 10 most romantic places in the world to propose in 2026. From Bali to Paris, explore dreamy destinations perfect for unforgettable “Will you marry me?” moments.

Which tourist cities have the fastest—and slowest—mobile internet in 2026? From Doha to Havana, discover where mobile data flies and where poor connectivity can slow your trip.

Discover the world’s 12 most relaxing cities to visit right now, from sun-soaked beaches to green urban escapes perfect for slow, stress-free travel.

The US issues a Level 4 “Do Not Travel” advisory for 21 countries, warning citizens of extreme safety risks and limited emergency assistance.

Sikkim has made online permits mandatory for foreign tourists, scrapping physical PAP and RAP issuance. Here’s how the new digital clearance system works and which areas are open to visitors.

Michelin Guide reveals 16 must-visit food destinations for 2026—from Venice and the Amalfi Coast to Vancouver and Route 66. Where to eat, when to go.

Escape the winter blues with these 8 underrated winter sun destinations. From Kerala to Brazil, discover warm, sunny spots perfect for a January getaway.

Germany announces visa-free airport transit for Indian passport holders. Here’s what the new rule means, key conditions, and who benefits.

Discover Uzbekistan, the one country where you can explore vast deserts, ancient Silk Road cities and snowy mountains in a single trip. From Samarkand to the Kyzylkum Desert and ski resorts near Tashkent, here’s why Uzbekistan is Central Asia’s most underrated travel destination.

Discover the top 10 noctourism destinations for 2026, from Rome’s twilight tours to Thailand’s Full Moon Parties. Explore cities that come alive after dark with night markets, stargazing, cultural tours, and more.

Vietnam is emerging as a top year-end family destination in Asia, attracting travelers from South Korea, India, Malaysia, and beyond with its beaches, cultural landmarks, and family-friendly resorts.

Make the most of the Republic Day 2026 long weekend with these 10 quick trips in India. From beaches and deserts to hills and cultural hotspots, plan your mini-vacation without taking leave.

Rome has been named the world’s best noctourism destination for 2026, offering unforgettable after-dark experiences, night tours and illuminated landmarks.

Sissu village in Himachal’s Lahaul-Spiti has banned tourists for 40 days from January 20 to February 28 to protect Losar and Halda festival traditions.

Jeddah Tower in Saudi Arabia is set to become the world’s tallest skyscraper, surpassing Burj Khalifa. Discover its height, luxury amenities, engineering feats, and Vision 2030 ambitions.

Darjeeling tops Agoda’s list of most searched North-East destinations for Oct–Dec 2025. Discover the best time to visit, top attractions, and hidden gems like Gangtok, Shillong, Cherrapunji, and Kalimpong.

Doha has been named the GCC Tourism Capital for 2026. Here’s what the title means for travellers, Gulf tourism, sustainability and regional growth.

Discover why Longyearbyen, a remote town in Norway, doesn’t allow birth or death—and how science and survival shape life in the Arctic.

Discover 5 international destinations Indians can travel to under Rs 70,000 during Republic Day 2026 long weekend. Explore Nepal, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Bhutan, and Malaysia on a budget-friendly short trip.

IndiGo ranks among Asia-Pacific’s top 10 most punctual airlines for 2025, achieving a 78.12% on-time performance. Discover what this means for travelers and why IndiGo remains a reliable choice for timely flights.

Discover the 7 Asian destinations you can’t miss in 2026, according to a new Rough Guides travel report highlighting top cultural, urban, and nature escapes.

India’s Ghaziabad RRTS station on the Delhi–Meerut corridor is set to become a landmark transit hub with the country’s first rooftop restaurant, shopping outlets, cafés, wellness centres, and more. Discover a one-stop destination for commuters and tourists alike.

Republic Day 2026 falls on Monday, January 26, creating a long weekend perfect for travel. Discover top domestic and international destinations, days off, and smart planning tips for a memorable January getaway.

US Embassy warns Indian B1, B2 visa holders to follow visitor rules strictly, cautioning that misuse or overstaying could lead to a permanent US travel ban.

TasteAtlas crowns Naples as the world’s best food city in 2026. From iconic pizza to legendary street food, here’s why Naples tops the global culinary map.

Mumbai ranks 5th on TasteAtlas’ 100 Best Food Cities to Visit in 2026, with six Indian cities featured in total. Discover where Delhi, Hyderabad, Amritsar, Kolkata, and Chennai stand on the list and plan your ultimate culinary journey across India.

Japan will triple its departure tax from July 2026, raising exit fees from JPY 1,000 to JPY 3,000 for all travellers. Here’s how it works, who pays, upcoming JESTA fees, and what it means for your Japan travel plans.

The US has expanded its visa bond policy to 38 countries, including Nepal and Bangladesh, requiring some travellers to pay up to USD 15,000 for B1/B2 visas. Here’s who is affected, how the bond works, airport rules, refunds, and whether India is on the list.

Experience the Jaisalmer Desert Festival 2026 from January 30 to February 1. Discover must-see events, camel races, folk music, desert safaris, local cuisine, handicrafts, and travel tips for Rajasthan’s most iconic cultural celebration.

Discover why Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, is Europe’s cheapest city to visit in 2026. From €40 stays and €2 beers to rich history, food, and culture, here’s everything you need to know.
